GetBidStrings(Int32)

Helper function. Constructs a string containing all the bids from of the given auction contract. Returns an empty lists if no bids are found.

| Improve this Doc View Source

getContractItemString(Int64, Boolean)

Helper function. For a given contract, constructs a string of the items in the given contract, with a specific formatting. If listPublic is false, it is assumed that the contract is part of the authorized characters contracts, otherwise it's public.

Declaration
public List<List<string>> getContractItemString(long contractId, bool isPublic = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int64 contractId

ID of the contract
System.Boolean isPublic

Whether the contract is a public or character one
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Collections.Generic.List<System.String>>

List of item info strings
| Improve this Doc View Source

HandleContracts(String[])

Handles the "contracts" command. Displays a given page of contracts in the input region. If no region is given, the default region is used.

Declaration
public void HandleContracts(string[] tokens)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String[] tokens

Command line tokens

HandleMyContracts(String[])

Handles the "my_contracts" command. Displays all contracts of the authorized character.
